text: #Esperanza is offering #COVID19 vaccines to our established 65+ patients! Call (773) 584-6200 for an appt. Our #vaccine clinic is located @ @BeNobleMHS next to our #BrightonPark clinic. We’ll share info about more appts. on our Facebook page & website: https://t.co/VqkbdspUWC https://t.co/HYvc7TByxE
